tool_description: Calculates comprehensive air quality scores based on multiple metrics using weighted algorithms and health-based standards.

co2_ppm.description: CO2 concentration in parts per million

voc_ppb.description: Volatile organic compounds in parts per billion

formaldehyde_ppb.description: Formaldehyde concentration in parts per billion

scoring_standard.description: Air quality standard to use: who, epa, custom

weighting_profile.description: Metric weighting profile: balanced, health_focused, comfort_focused

error_messages: No valid metrics: At least one air quality metric must be provided.
Invalid metric ranges: Check that all provided metrics are within reasonable ranges for indoor air.
Invalid scoring standard: Use who, epa, or custom.
Invalid weighting profile: Use balanced, health_focused, or comfort_focused.
Negative values: Air quality metrics cannot be negative.
usage: Provide one or more air quality metrics (temperature, humidity, co2_ppm, pm25, pm10, voc_ppb, formaldehyde_ppb) and optionally specify scoring_standard and weighting_profile.

overall_score.description: Overall air quality score from 0-100 (100 being excellent)

quality_category.description: Quality category: excellent, good, moderate, poor, hazardous

individual_scores.description: Individual scores for each provided metric

primary_concern.description: Metric with lowest score requiring attention

health_impact.description: Potential health impact level: minimal, low, moderate, high
